department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
duration_in_months: If this document has multiple amendments, add proposed duration to the posting date period, otherwise use the following values: 7 months
full_summary:
================

### ECS095-230007: Request for Standing Offer for Coffee and Tea Supplies

#### Solicitation Number
WS4220654570

#### Publication Date
2024-03-12

#### Tender Closing Date
2024-04-08T14:00:00

### Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is inviting firms to submit a standing offer for the supply of coffee and tea under the Request for Standing Offer (RSO) process. The tender is open to firms having undergone a bid evaluation.

### Solicitation Details
- **Amendment Number**: 1
- **Modification Date**: 2024-03-14
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: Not specified (though contract end date is specified)
- **Expected Contract End Date**: 2025-05-14
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive, Open Bidding

### Terms and Conditions

- The tender is exclusively under the terms and conditions of the Request for Standing Offer.
- The procured goods will be used locally within Canada (Quebec is explicitly listed).
- The lowest price will be the sole basis for evaluation of tenders.

### Important Information
- **Trade Agreements**: The tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (FTA).
- **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (Category GD).
- **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer.
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price.

### Instructions
Please submit your tender as per the instructions in the RSO document. Contact Tara Sheppard, Contract Manager, via email at tara.sheppard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca for any additional information.

### Additional Resources
The RSO document can be accessed via the attached notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19064961?extsite=MTkwNjQ5NjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: The PDF attachment is not included here. Ensure that you download it from the link above.

Please acknowledge receipt of this notice by contacting the above email address and mention the solicitation number. The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) will not be responsible for any delay in the solicitation due to any impossibility in accessing the notice. Thank you.  #ECS095-230008 https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19064961?extsite=MTkwNjQ5NjFf
